Hi,\nto enable the new years feature, please enable Accesssibiility Settings. You do this by first opening the acccessbility menu, getting greeted with the warning, that this app cannot be trusted, then close the settings, long press on the app icon, and select app info. Now enable under the three dots overflow menu the restricted settings. Once done, come back here and click on the accessibiiilitiay configuration to actually enable this.
